name: Weather App
description: The app has a user-friendly interface for inputting a city name and retrieving corresponding weather data. It utilizes the Weather API to access real-time information.

name: Usuarios
description: The app enables efficient user registration, deletion, and editing while seamlessly integrating with an API, enhancing user management with flexibility and scalability.

name: Wiki Spartans
description: The app showcases a button that, when clicked or refreshed, reveals a randomly generated Spartan, adding an element of surprise and excitement to the user experience.

name: Rick&Morty App
description: Users can explore details about various locations, either by randomly discovering them or by searching for specific ones, adding to the immersive experience of the show.

name: Pokedex App
description: With its login authentication, filtering, and search options, the app provides users with an interactive and personalized experience to immerse themselves in the captivating world of Pok√©mon.
